mapping.sql: select DIM_CODE AS "DIM_CODE" from X_KPI_DIM_CODE where DIM_CODE=#dim_code#

update X_KPI_DIM_CODE set CODE_TABLE=#code_table#, CODE_TABLE_DESC=#code_table_desc#, COLUMN_CODE=#column_code#, COLUMN_DESC=#column_desc#, COLUMN_ORD=#column_ord#, COLUMN_PARENT=#column_parent#, CONF_TYPE=#conf_type#, CONDITION=#condition#, UPDATE_USER=#UserInfo.USER_ID#, UPDATE_DATETIME=#time()#, DIM_PARENT_CODE=#dim_parent_code#, DIM_LEVEL=#dim_level#, DIM_DEFAULT=#dim_default#, DIM_RIGHT=#dim_right#, DIM_TYPE=#dim_type#, DIM_CATEGORY=#dim_category# where DIM_CODE =#dim_code#

SELECT DIM_CODE AS "DIM_CODE", CODE_TABLE AS "CODE_TABLE", CODE_TABLE_DESC AS "CODE_TABLE_DESC", COLUMN_CODE AS "COLUMN_CODE", COLUMN_DESC AS "COLUMN_DESC", COLUMN_ORD AS "COLUMN_ORD", COLUMN_PARENT AS "COLUMN_PARENT" FROM X_KPI_DIM_CODE WHERE 1=1 { AND DIM_CODE != #dim_code#}
SELECT CATEGORY_ID AS "CATEGORY_ID", CATEGORY_NAME AS "CATEGORY_NAME", CATEGORY_ORD AS "CATEGORY_ORD" FROM X_KPI_DIM_CATEGORY ORDER BY CATEGORY_ORD
SELECT ATTR_CODE AS "ATTR_CODE", ATTR_NAME AS "ATTR_NAME" FROM E_USER_ATTR_DIM

SELECT DIM_CODE, CODE_TABLE, CODE_TABLE_DESC, COLUMN_CODE, COLUMN_DESC, COLUMN_ORD, COLUMN_PARENT, CONF_TYPE, CONDITION, DIM_PARENT_CODE, DIM_LEVEL, DIM_DEFAULT, DIM_RIGHT, DIM_TYPE, DIM_CATEGORY FROM X_KPI_DIM_CODE WHERE 1=1 {AND DIM_CODE = #dim_code# }
